thread.title: Adam 'Pacman' Jones Arrest Video Released by TMZ
thread.title_full: Adam 'Pacman' Jones Arrest Video Released by TMZ

author: Joseph Zucker
title: Adam 'Pacman' Jones Arrest Video Released by TMZ
text: Adam 'Pacman' Jones Arrest Video Released by TMZ Tim Warner/Getty Images Joseph Zucker Featured Columnist January 23, 2017 On Monday, TMZ Sports shared video footage of Cincinnati Bengals cornerback Adam "Pacman" Jones' Jan. 3 arrest following an incident at the Millennium Hotel in Cincinnati . The video showed Jones using obscenities directed toward the arresting officers and wishing death upon one officer (warning: video contains NSFW language) : According to the Cincinnati Enquirer 's Paul Dehner Jr., Kevin Grasha and Jim Owczarski , Jones was released from jail Jan. 4. Authorities charged him with felony harassment with a bodily substance, assault, disorderly conduct and obstructing police. Jones is alleged to have poked a member of Millennium Hotel security in the eye after security received reports of Jones " beating on different hotel room doors." Upon being arrested, the 33-year-old allegedly physically resisted officers' efforts to put him in a police vehicle. The Associated Press reported Jones will have a hearing in front of a Hamilton County judge Feb. 10. Like the new article format? !
